movies.title: Salaar
movies.description: Salaar follows the story of Deva, a man who rises from the shadows of his past to challenge the most dangerous criminal empire. With intense action, raw emotions, and a tale of brotherhood, the film blends high-octane sequences with heartfelt drama. It explores themes of power, loyalty, and survival in a world ruled by violence. Prabhas delivers a larger-than-life performance that elevates the film’s grandeur. The movie promises edge-of-the-seat action along with deep emotional layers.

movies.title: Mahavatar Narsimha
movies.description: Mahavatar Narsimha is a retelling of the ancient mythological tale of Lord Vishnu’s fierce incarnation, Narasimha. The film blends stunning animation with powerful storytelling to showcase the eternal fight between good and evil. Through action-packed sequences and dramatic visuals, it brings the legend of Prahlada and Hiranyakashipu to life for a modern audience. It highlights themes of faith, justice, and divine intervention. A spiritual journey filled with both spectacle and emotional depth.

movies.title: Param Sundari
movies.description: Param Sundari follows the journey of a young woman whose beauty and charm hide her struggles with identity and societal expectations. The drama explores her relationships, ambitions, and the conflicts she faces in a world quick to judge appearances. It delves into emotional themes of self-worth, love, and acceptance. With compelling performances, the film creates a balance between raw realism and cinematic storytelling. A heart-touching narrative about resilience and inner strength.

movies.title: Saiyaara
movies.description: Saiyaara is a soulful romantic tale of two people brought together by destiny but separated by circumstances. Their love blossoms in the backdrop of modern city life, exploring both passion and heartbreak. The story portrays the sacrifices lovers make for each other and the challenges of long-distance relationships. With melodious music and heartfelt performances, the film captures the essence of timeless romance. It is both an emotional rollercoaster and a celebration of love.

movies.title: Coolie: The Powerhouse (Hindi)
movies.description: Coolie: The Powerhouse tells the story of a fearless worker who becomes the voice of the oppressed against corrupt forces. The film is packed with high-energy action, thrilling stunts, and powerful dialogues. It explores the fight for justice and dignity among common people. The protagonist’s courage and determination to protect his people form the core of the narrative. A mass entertainer with a blend of action, drama, and emotion.

movies.title: Dhadak 2
movies.description: Dhadak 2 is a heart-rending tale of young lovers who face societal and family opposition due to class and cultural divides. Set against the backdrop of a vibrant yet conservative society, their story is filled with passion, pain, and resilience. The film showcases the innocence of first love and the courage to fight against all odds. Emotional performances add depth to the narrative, making it relatable to every generation. A soulful soundtrack elevates the intensity of their journey.

movies.title: Son of Sardaar 2
movies.description: Son of Sardaar 2 brings back the beloved characters in a laughter-filled ride of family feuds, misunderstandings, and comical adventures. Set in the colorful backdrop of Punjab, the film is filled with witty one-liners and situational humor. It highlights themes of friendship, love, and family bonds in a lighthearted way. With over-the-top antics and hilarious twists, it promises non-stop entertainment. A perfect blend of comedy and emotional connect for all age groups.

movies.title: Lokah: Chapter 1 - Chandra
movies.description: Lokah: Chapter 1 - Chandra is a gripping thriller that uncovers the dark secrets of a mysterious organization. The story follows Chandra, an ordinary man caught in extraordinary circumstances, battling against hidden powers. With twists and suspense at every turn, the narrative keeps viewers guessing until the very end. Themes of betrayal, power, and survival dominate the film. It sets the stage for an epic saga, leaving audiences eagerly waiting for the next chapter.

movies.title: F1: The Movie
movies.description: F1: The Movie is an adrenaline-packed documentary that takes audiences inside the world of Formula One racing. It showcases the lives of legendary drivers, the cutting-edge technology of race cars, and the thrill of high-speed competition. The film reveals the challenges, risks, and sacrifices that come with pursuing racing glory. Spectacular visuals put viewers right on the track. A must-watch for motorsport enthusiasts and casual viewers alike.

movies.title: Rockstar
movies.description: Rockstar is the emotional journey of a young musician whose passion for music intertwines with his turbulent love life. The film portrays the struggles of chasing dreams while dealing with heartbreak and fame. Soul-stirring songs form the heartbeat of the narrative, making it a musical masterpiece. The protagonist’s transformation from a carefree dreamer to a tormented artist is raw and powerful. A story that resonates with anyone who has loved, lost, and pursued their passion.

events.title: Comedy by Abhishek
events.description: Abishek brings you his brand new special — Abishek wants to Enjoy Life! With all the negativity and gloom surrounding us, people have gotten a little too serious and forgotten to enjoy life. Abishek is here to bring you all the light, positive energy, and super funny observations and anecdotes from his own life. The show will have everything — some music, some movement, and definitely some jokes as well! This special is going to be a one-of-a-kind experience for the audience.

events.title: Sunburn Festival 2025
events.description: Asia’s biggest dance music festival returns with a brand-new chapter ~ Sunburn Festival 2025, now taking over Mumbai, Maharashtra for the first time ever!Get ready for a three-day celebration of music, culture, and lifestyle featuring massive global headliners, world-class supporting acts, and a community of thousands of dance music lovers coming together under one sky.Expect top-notch production, jaw-dropping stage designs, cutting-edge visuals, and immersive experiences that will redefine the festival landscape. From electrifying performances to curated lounges & brand zones alongside gourmet experiences - this is Sunburn like you’ve never seen before.Sunburn Festival 2025 : Mumbai, Maharashtra becomes the new home of dance music.

events.title: Perfume Making Workshop at ZIndagi
events.description: Step into the art of fragrance creation at our Perfume making workshop, Guided by an expert perfumer, you’ll learn how scents are composed, how top, middle, and base notes work together, and how to blend them into a signature fragrance that’s uniquely yours. Join us for this hands-on session- All materials and refreshments will be provided — just bring your curiosity and love for fine scents.

events.title: Single's meetup
events.description: Welcome to the `Single`s Meetup`  a unique meetup designed specifically for singles who are eager to connect, share, and celebrate the solo journey. In the hustle of everyday life, finding a space to openly discuss the experiences, challenges, and triumphs of being single is rare. That`s where we come in.This isn`t your typical singles event with the pressure of finding `the one.` Instead, it`s an evening dedicated to the art of living single, where you can share stories, laugh about the dating disasters, and discuss the personal growth and freedom that comes with this phase of life.

events.title: MIrai movie
events.description: Life is real the way it stares you at the face. A certificate is an attempt to make it funnier and happier. I believe in the power of laughter to heal and unite. Even the most offensive jokes can bring people together in laughter.
